speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Dave from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Lisa?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Lisa. Who is calling?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your overdue account. Frankly, I'm pissed off about the constant delaysâ€”this shit is getting out of hand. Can you confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, Lisa. Also, please verify your current address.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, appreciate it. Now, you have an outstanding balance of $420. When are you planning to pay, or are you going to keep giving us fuck-all?

speaker: Customer
text: I plan to make a partial payment today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I'll note the partial payment. Just make sure you don't fuck around with the due dates again.

speaker: Customer
text: Understood. I'll get the payment sorted.

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks. I'll follow up with you next week. Goodbye.
